Title: Unless you’re in the mafia, your company isn’t your family
Description: Dedication to your employer is a tradition in some cultures. My father was a dedicated coal miner and when the mine closed up he became a factory worker. He worked 40+ years in that factory in three shifts. He kept complaining about “those up there” in the hierarchy and yet the company was a big part of his life. He was always interested in what the company did even long after he retired.

Title: Extending Next.js support in Azure Static Web Apps
Description: Next.js is one of the most popular JavaScript frameworks for building complex, server-driven React applications, combining the features that make React a useful UI library with server-side rendering, built-in API support and SEO optimizations. Title: Blazor WASM Custom 404 Page on GH Pages

Title: Git from the Bottom Up – Reset, Stash, and Reflog
